Per Curiam,
Tbe order for a new trial is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alessandeoni.

casebody.head_matter:
Lester v. Century Indemnity Company, Appellant.
Argued January 8, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

David. 8. Malis, for appellee.
January 28, 1947:
